full_summary:
### Released Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** Badgeley Island Lighthouse Demolition Service
**Reference Number:** cb-6098-35279020
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 30004119

**Publication Date:** June 2, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2023 at 13:00:00

**Expected Contract Start Date:** June 26, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** September 1, 2023

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Description:**
The Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a contractor to demolish the existing Badgeley Island Lighthouse (LL987) located in the North Georgian Bay. The scope of work includes:

* Demolition of the original steel tower and foundations
* Removal of all remaining solar panels, wiring, lighting, and associated components
* Transportation of demolished goods from the site
* Disposal of all waste at a licensed waste disposal facility

**Environmental Considerations:**
Due to the remote location and proximity to Georgian Bay, a detailed Environmental Protection Plan must be implemented to address the items listed in the specifications. The plan must account for the demolition of the structure and transportation of the demolished goods.

**Contract Requirements:**
The Contractor must complete the work by September 1, 2023.
Site work is expected to take approximately one week during the spring/summer season when the site is accessible by water.

**Contact Information:**
Kimberly Martin, Fisheries and Oceans Canada
Phone: (506) 429-2397
Email: dfotenders-soumissionsmpo@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

**Attachment:** 
Download the Request for Qualification document (English) | (French) from the GWAN website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/file/webform/tender_notice/6098/request-qualification-(en.pdf](http://https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6098/request-for-qualification-(en.pdf)|https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6098/demande-de-qualification-(fr.pdf)](http/[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6098/demande-de-qualification-(fr.pdf) )

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
